oracle.pg.text.solr

Class SolrParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.pg.text.IndexParametersBase
      • oracle.pg.text.solr.SolrParameters

  • public class SolrParameters
extends IndexParametersBase
    This class manages the parameters and utilities for SolrCloud indexes

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getConfigName()
      Gets the configuration name used to create the SolrCloud collection where the index will be stored
      int getMaxShardsPerNode()
      Gets the maximum shards per node used in the SolrCloud collection where the index will be stored.
      int getNumShards()
      Gets the number of shards used in the SolrCloud collection where the index will be stored.
      int getReplicationFactor()
      Gets the replication factor used in the SolrCloud collection where the index will be stored.
      java.lang.String getSolrNodeSet()
      Gets the node set used to store the SolrCloud collection.
      java.lang.String getSolrServerUrl()
      Gets the SolrCloud server URL used to connect to the Apache SolR Cloud service.
      int getZkTimeout()
      Gets the Zookeeper timeout (in seconds) used for Apache SolR connections

      • Methods inherited from class oracle.pg.text.IndexParametersBase

        getBatchSize, getCommitBatchSize, getNumConnections, getParametersMap, getWriteTimeout

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getConfigName

        public java.lang.String getConfigName()
        Gets the configuration name used to create the SolrCloud collection where the index will be stored
        Returns:
        the configuration name used to create the Apache SolR cloud collection where the index will be stored. Default value is set to opgconfig,

      • getMaxShardsPerNode

        public int getMaxShardsPerNode()
        Gets the maximum shards per node used in the SolrCloud collection where the index will be stored.
        Returns:
        a positive integer representing the maximum shards per node used in the SolrCloud collection. The default value is set 1.

      • getNumShards

        public int getNumShards()
        Gets the number of shards used in the SolrCloud collection where the index will be stored.
        Returns:
        a positive integer representing the number of shards used in the SolrCloud collection. The default value is set 2.

      • getReplicationFactor

        public int getReplicationFactor()
        Gets the replication factor used in the SolrCloud collection where the index will be stored.
        Returns:
        a positive integer representing the replication factor used in the SolrCloud collection. The default value is set 1.

      • getSolrNodeSet

        public java.lang.String getSolrNodeSet()
        Gets the node set used to store the SolrCloud collection.
        Returns:
        a string representing the node set used to store the SolrCloud collection. E.g. node01:8983_solr,node02:8983_solr,node03:8983_solr

      • getSolrServerUrl

        public java.lang.String getSolrServerUrl()
        Gets the SolrCloud server URL used to connect to the Apache SolR Cloud service.
        Returns:
        the SolrCloud server URL used to connect to the SolrCloud service. E.g., http://localhost:2181/solr

      • getZkTimeout

        public final int getZkTimeout()
        Gets the Zookeeper timeout (in seconds) used for Apache SolR connections
        Returns:
        a positive integer representing the timeout (in seconds) used to wait for a Zookeeper connection. The default value is set to 15.
